category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_download_utility_path
preference.preference_description: Specifies International Material Data System (IMDS) download utility path on Teamcenter server. This value is used by the "imds_download_process_files" utility.
